section.name: Trademarks
section.p: Oracle and Java are registered trademarks of Oracle and/or its affiliates. Other names may be trademarks of their respective owners.
EJBCA is a registered trademark of PrimeKey Solutions AB.

section.name: Credits
section.p: Software that the SignServer uses library of and couldn't have been created without them:

ul.li: Bouncy Castle, An excellent cryptographic Java library.
Velocity, used to generate the web site pages.
iText, A library that allows you to generate PDF files on the fly.
JSCH, a Java Implementation of SSH2.
JMRTD, a free implementation of the Machine Readable Travel Document (MRTD) standards as specified by the International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO).
ODFDOM, Library for parsing and manipulating odf documents.
openxml4j, Library for parsing and manipulating open office xml documents.
XAdES4j, A Java library for XAdES signature services.
Jsign, a Java implementation of Microsoft Authenticode for signing Windows executable files.
